Ivró Bueb does not appear in the "entrant" column for this year as well.

Since Ivró Bueb's name is absent from the "entrant" column in all three relevant years, we cannot conclude that he participated and scored zero points during any of these years. However, without further information or confirmation, we can only determine this with certainty for 1957.
